info.description: This is a sample server Petstore server.  You can find out more about Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).  For this sample, you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization filters.
info.title: Swagger Petstore

externalDocs.description: Find out more about our store

parameters.name: petId
parameters.description: ID of pet to update

parameters.name: additionalMetadata
parameters.description: Additional data to pass to server

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: file to upload

x-code-samples.source:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/%7BpetId%7D/uploadImage",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    "accept: multipart/form-data",
    "authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

import requests

url = "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/%7BpetId%7D/uploadImage"

headers = {
    'accept': "multipart/form-data",
    'content-type': "application/json",
    'authorization': "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN"
    }

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("petstore.swagger.io")

headers = {
    'accept': "multipart/form-data",
    'content-type': "application/json",
    'authorization': "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/v2/pet/%7BpetId%7D/uploadImage", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/%7BpetId%7D/uploadImage"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("accept", "multipart/form-data")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")
	req.Header.Add("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

curl --request POST \
  --url https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/%7BpetId%7D/uploadImage \
  --header 'accept: multipart/form-data' \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json'

post.summary: Add a new pet to the store

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store

x-code-samples.source:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"id\":0,\"category\":{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\"},\"name\":\"doggie\",\"photoUrls\":[\"string\"],\"tags\":[{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\"}],\"status\":\"available\"}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    "accept: application/xml",
    "authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN",
    "content-type: application/xml"
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

import requests

url = "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet"

payload = "{\"id\":0,\"category\":{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\"},\"name\":\"doggie\",\"photoUrls\":[\"string\"],\"tags\":[{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\"}],\"status\":\"available\"}"
headers = {
    'accept': "application/xml",
    'content-type': "application/xml",
    'authorization': "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN"
    }

response = requests.request("POST", url, data=payload, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("petstore.swagger.io")

payload = "{\"id\":0,\"category\":{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\"},\"name\":\"doggie\",\"photoUrls\":[\"string\"],\"tags\":[{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\"}],\"status\":\"available\"}"

headers = {
    'accept': "application/xml",
    'content-type': "application/xml",
    'authorization': "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/v2/pet", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"id\":0,\"category\":{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\"},\"name\":\"doggie\",\"photoUrls\":[\"string\"],\"tags\":[{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\"}],\"status\":\"available\"}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("accept", "application/xml")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/xml")
	req.Header.Add("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

curl --request POST \
  --url https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet \
  --header 'accept: application/xml' \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/xml' \
  --data '{"id":0,"category":{"id":0,"name":"string"},"name":"doggie","photoUrls":["string"],"tags":[{"id":0,"name":"string"}],"status":"available"}'

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"id\":0,\"category\":{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\"},\"name\":\"doggie\",\"photoUrls\":[\"string\"],\"tags\":[{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\"}],\"status\":\"available\"}")

  --url https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet \
  --header 'accept: application/xml' \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/xml' \

get.description: Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings

parameters.description: Status values that need to be considered for filter

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/findByStatus?status=SOME_ARRAY_VALUE",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    "authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN",
    "content-type: application/xml"
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

    'authorization': "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN"
    }

	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/xml")
	req.Header.Add("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

  --url 'https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/findByStatus?status=SOME_ARRAY_VALUE' \

post.summary: Place an order for a pet

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: order placed for purchasing the pet

x-code-samples.source:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store/order",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"id\":0,\"petId\":0,\"quantity\":0,\"shipDate\":\"2020-05-29T05:30:21Z\",\"status\":\"placed\",\"complete\":true}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    "accept: application/json",
    "content-type: application/xml"
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

import requests

url = "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store/order"

payload = "{\"id\":0,\"petId\":0,\"quantity\":0,\"shipDate\":\"2020-05-29T05:30:21Z\",\"status\":\"placed\",\"complete\":true}"
headers = {
    'accept': "application/json",
    'content-type': "application/xml"
    }

response = requests.request("POST", url, data=payload, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("petstore.swagger.io")

payload = "{\"id\":0,\"petId\":0,\"quantity\":0,\"shipDate\":\"2020-05-29T05:30:21Z\",\"status\":\"placed\",\"complete\":true}"

headers = {
    'accept': "application/json",
    'content-type': "application/xml"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/v2/store/order", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store/order"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"id\":0,\"petId\":0,\"quantity\":0,\"shipDate\":\"2020-05-29T05:30:21Z\",\"status\":\"placed\",\"complete\":true}")

	req.Header.Add("accept", "application/json")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/xml")

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/xml")

  --header 'content-type: application/xml'

post.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Created user object

x-code-samples.source:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"id\":0,\"username\":\"string\",\"firstName\":\"string\",\"lastName\":\"string\",\"email\":\"string\",\"password\":\"string\",\"phone\":\"string\",\"userStatus\":0}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    "accept: application/json",
    "content-type: application/xml"
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

import requests

url = "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user"

payload = "{\"id\":0,\"username\":\"string\",\"firstName\":\"string\",\"lastName\":\"string\",\"email\":\"string\",\"password\":\"string\",\"phone\":\"string\",\"userStatus\":0}"
headers = {
    'accept': "application/json",
    'content-type': "application/xml"
    }

response = requests.request("POST", url, data=payload, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("petstore.swagger.io")

payload = "{\"id\":0,\"username\":\"string\",\"firstName\":\"string\",\"lastName\":\"string\",\"email\":\"string\",\"password\":\"string\",\"phone\":\"string\",\"userStatus\":0}"

headers = {
    'accept': "application/json",
    'content-type': "application/xml"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/v2/user", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"id\":0,\"username\":\"string\",\"firstName\":\"string\",\"lastName\":\"string\",\"email\":\"string\",\"password\":\"string\",\"phone\":\"string\",\"userStatus\":0}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("accept", "application/json")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/xml")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

curl --request POST \
  --url https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user \
  --header 'accept: application/json' \
  --header 'content-type: application/xml' \
  --data '{"id":0,"username":"string","firstName":"string","lastName":"string","email":"string","password":"string","phone":"string","userStatus":0}'
